state.response: موسمی طور پر دستیاب نامیاتی اور مقامی غذاؤں کا انتخاب کرنے سے دور دراز سے غذا کی نقل و حمل سے نکلنے والے اخراجات کو کم کیا جا سکتا ہے۔
claims: Choosing seasonal organic and local foods reduces transportation emissions.

claims: Choosing seasonal organic and local foods reduces transportation emissions.

Choosing seasonal organic and local food: Does choosing seasonal organic and local foods reduce transportation emissions? Impact of seasonal organic and local foods on transportation emissions

Seasonal eating also aligns with the natural ecological cycles, supporting sustainable agriculture practices. Choosing local, seasonal foods helps us reduce the environmental impact associated with long-distance transportation and storage.
Does choosing seasonal organic and local foods reduce transportation emissions? Impact of seasonal organic and local foods on transportation emissions

High food miles typically mean higher amounts of carbon dioxide emissions. By focusing on local and seasonal products, consumers can drastically reduce these miles, directly contributing to a decrease in transport-related emissions.
